ygData.subject: RE: getting along (was: RE Petiton to replace level 14  song)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If I remember the interview that I believe you re referring to they said it would take a lot of work but they didn t make it sound like it was an
ygData.messageBody:
> and rearrangeable spellbook. BTW, I've already
> heard from Brad on that one - it would require
> INCREDIBLE amounts of programming that they can't
> do right now.

If I remember the interview that I believe you're
referring to they said it would take a lot of work
but they didn't make it sound like it was an
incredible amount. Besides, this is something that
would be of benefit for EVERY class in EQ except for
2 or 3. It wouldn't have any bearing on game balance
or race/class balance in any way. It would be nothing
but beneficial.
